public class MonitorHttpGUI extends MonitorHttp
Class: MonitorHttpGUI extends MonitorHttp This class provides HTTP-related functionality for the graphical user interface.

    • getTableforContainer

      public String[] getTableforContainer() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Description copied from class: MonitorHttp
      Method: getTableforContainer() retrieves information about a container and formats it into an array for table representation.
      Overrides:
      getTableforContainer in class MonitorHttp
      Returns:
      An array containing container information: [0] Container ID [1] Container Name [2] Container Status [3] Image ID [4] Network ID [5] Gateway [6] IP Address [7] Mac Address
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error processing the JSON response.

    • getContainerStats

      public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getContainerStats(String GOT_TO_DELETE)

      Abstract method to retrieve statistics for a container.
      Specified by:
      getContainerStats in class MonitorHttp
      Parameters:
      GOT_TO_DELETE - The ID of the container for which statistics are requested.
      Returns:
      CloseableHttpResponse containing container statistics. Implementation should handle the specific logic for obtaining container stats.

    • getImagesListGUI

      public void getImagesListGUI()
      Method: getImagesListGUI() Sends an HTTP request to retrieve a list of images with additional information. The request includes parameters to exclude intermediate images and include shared image size. Prints the request URL to the console.

    • executeHttpRequest

      public void executeHttpRequest(String message)
      Method: executeHttpRequest(String) executes the http request for getting info about a container.
      Specified by:
      executeHttpRequest in interface HttpInterface
      Overrides:
      executeHttpRequest in class SuperHttp
      Parameters:
      message - the final part of the url that is used to get the info. may throw Exception if an error occurs while executing the http request.

      public ArrayList<String> getFormattedImageIdsList()
      Method: getFormattedImageIdsList() Parses the JSON response to extract formatted image IDs.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing formatted image IDs. If an error occurs during parsing, returns null.

      Method: getFormattedImageNamesList() Parses the JSON response to extract formatted image names.
